items.summary: Ensure the Open Graph / Twitter card image file is present in the deployed frontend asset canister at the public root path `/ogcard.jpg` (not only referenced in metadata), so OpenGraph/Twitter crawlers can fetch it directly.
Verify and, if needed, correct the IC asset deployment configuration so `ogcard.jpg` is included in the asset canister upload rules and is not ignored during build/deploy.
Keep Open Graph and Twitter meta tags in `frontend/index.html` referencing the absolute URL `https://www.prabhatchhirolya.com/ogcard.jpg` and ensure the declared image type remains `image/jpeg`.
